definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: I kindly told him to turn it down a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 我友善地告訴他，把音響的音量關小點。

sentences.english: When I saw that my partner was just bein' friendly.
sentences.chinese: 當我看見我的夥伴不過是有點友善。

sentences.english: "She was the most humble, sweet person, " Valentin said.
sentences.chinese: “她是一個非常謙遜和友善的人，”瓦倫丁說。

sentences.english: Everybody likes Casper the friendly ghost.
sentences.chinese: 大家都喜歡卡士伯這個友善的鬼。

sentences.english: Hu Ping thinks that the sea turtle is a quite friendly animal.
sentences.chinese: 在胡萍的眼裏，海龜是一種相當友善的動物。

sentences.english: D. Friendliness is a defining characteristic of affability.
sentences.chinese: 友善是和藹的必然特徵。

sentences.english: I Dongli Mao, the friendly people.
My partners' name are Kai Ting and Shu Qing, they are all very friendly.
sentences.chinese: 我的學伴的名字是楷婷和淑菁，他們非常的友善。

sentences.english: Now, the city-state wants its citizens to just be... nicer.
sentences.chinese: 而今，這個“城國”又想讓其國民變得更加友善一些。

sentences.english: Y. There a friendly captain pointed across the Niagara River.
sentences.chinese: 在那兒，一位友善的船長指着尼亞加拉河對岸。

sentences.english: It is said that kindness is the universal language of love.
sentences.chinese: 據說友善是愛的通用語。

sentences.english: When someone is unkind to you, try responding with gentleness.
sentences.chinese: 當有人對你並不友善，試着回以親切。

sentences.english: I am happy and bright life and people-friendly.
sentences.chinese: 生活中的我活潑開朗與人友善。

sentences.english: With his friendly manners and loyalty he perfectly fitted into our team.
sentences.chinese: 他的友善和忠誠使他很好地融入了我們的團隊。

sentences.english: A friendly shopkeeper suggests I explore Lanai 's Shipwreck Beach.
sentences.chinese: 一位友善的店老闆建議我走訪拉奈島上的船難海灘。

sentences.english: Mr Cameron set out to rebrand the Tories as kinder and greener. It worked.
sentences.chinese: 卡麥隆着手重塑保守黨的形象，使其更加友善和環保。

definition: Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
